metadata.title: CVE-2020-12352 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Improper access control in BlueZ may allow an unauthenticated user topotentially enable information disclosure via adjacent access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-12352` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-unsigned-5.13.0-1004-kvm - 5.13.0-1004.4
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.13.0-1006-azure - 5.13.0-1006.7
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.13.0-1005-gcp - 5.13.0-1005.6
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1019-azure-fde - 5.15.0-1019.24.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1001-gkeop - 5.15.0-1001.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1002-ibm - 5.15.0-1002.2
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1004-nvidia - 6.5.0-1004.4
linux-image-unsigned-6.5.0-1004-nvidia-64k - 6.5.0-1004.4
No subscription required

linux-image-5.15.0-1022-xilinx-zynqmp - 5.15.0-1022.26
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in jammy is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '5.15.0-128.138').
linux-kvm package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.13.0-1004.4').
linux-aws package in jammy is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '5.15.0-1074.80').
linux-azure package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.13.0-1006.7').
linux-gcp package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.13.0-1005.6').
linux-oracle package in jammy is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '5.15.0-1072.78').
linux-raspi package in jammy is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '5.15.0-1067.70').
linux-azure-fde package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-1019.24.1').
linux-gke package in jammy is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '5.15.0-1071.77').
linux-gkeop package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-1001.2').
linux-ibm package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-1002.2').
linux-intel-iotg package in jammy is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '5.15.0-1069.75').
linux-lowlatency package in jammy is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '5.15.0-128.138').
linux-nvidia package in jammy is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '5.15.0-1069.70').
linux-nvidia-6.5 package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.5.0-1004.4').
linux-realtime: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by Ubuntu Pro ppa version').
linux-xilinx-zynqmp package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.15.0-1022.26').
